verses.text: the life was manifested, and we have seen, and bear witness, and declare to you that eternal life which was with the Father and was manifested to us—
parts: the life was manifested, and we have seen, and bear witness, and declare to you that eternal life which was with the Father and was manifested to us—

verses.text: that which we have seen and heard we declare to you, that you also may have fellowship with us; and truly our fellowshipiswith the Father and with His Son Jesus Christ.
parts: that which we have seen and heard we declare to you, that you also may have fellowship with us; and truly our fellowship
with the Father and with His Son Jesus Christ.

verses.text: And these things we write to you that yourajoy may be full.†
parts: And these things we write to you that your
joy may be full.

verses.text: This is the message which we have heard from Him and declare to you, that God is light and in Him is no darkness at all.If we say that we have fellowship with Him, and walk in darkness, we lie and do not practice the truth.But if we walk in the light as He is in the light, we have fellowship with one another, and the blood of Jesus Christ His Son cleanses us from all sin.
parts: This is the message which we have heard from Him and declare to you, that God is light and in Him is no darkness at all.
If we say that we have fellowship with Him, and walk in darkness, we lie and do not practice the truth.
But if we walk in the light as He is in the light, we have fellowship with one another, and the blood of Jesus Christ His Son cleanses us from all sin.

verses.text: If we say that we have fellowship with Him, and walk in darkness, we lie and do not practice the truth.
parts: If we say that we have fellowship with Him, and walk in darkness, we lie and do not practice the truth.

verses.text: But if we walk in the light as He is in the light, we have fellowship with one another, and the blood of Jesus Christ His Son cleanses us from all sin.
parts: But if we walk in the light as He is in the light, we have fellowship with one another, and the blood of Jesus Christ His Son cleanses us from all sin.

verses.text: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive usoursins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.If we say that we have not sinned, we make Him a liar, and His word is not in us.
parts: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us
sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.If we say that we have not sinned, we make Him a liar, and His word is not in us.

verses.text: If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive usoursins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
parts: If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us
sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

verses.text: If we say that we have not sinned, we make Him a liar, and His word is not in us.
parts: If we say that we have not sinned, we make Him a liar, and His word is not in us.

verses.text: And He Himself is the propitiation for our sins, and not for ours only but also for the whole world.
parts: And He Himself is the propitiation for our sins, and not for ours only but also for the whole world.

verses.text: Now by this we know that we know Him, if we keep His commandments.He who says, “I know Him,” and does not keep His commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.But whoever keeps His word, truly the love of God is perfected in him. By this we know that we are in Him.He who says he abides in Him ought himself also to walk just as He walked.
parts: Now by this we know that we know Him, if we keep His commandments.

He who says, “I know Him,” and does not keep His commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.But whoever keeps His word, truly the love of God is perfected in him. By this we know that we are in Him.He who says he abides in Him ought himself also to walk just as He walked.

verses.text: He who says, “I know Him,” and does not keep His commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.
parts: He who says, “I know Him,” and does not keep His commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.

verses.text: But whoever keeps His word, truly the love of God is perfected in him.
parts: But whoever keeps His word, truly the love of God is perfected in him.

verses.text: He who says he abides in Him ought himself also to walk just as He walked.
parts: He who says he abides in Him ought himself also to walk just as He walked.

verses.text: Brethren,aI write no new commandment to you, but an old commandment which you have had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which you heard from the beginning.bAgain, a new commandment I write to you, which thing is true in Him and in you, because the darkness is passing away, and the true light is already shining.
parts: Brethren,
I write no new commandment to you, but an old commandment which you have had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which you heard from the beginning.
Again, a new commandment I write to you, which thing is true in Him and in you, because the darkness is passing away, and the true light is already shining.

verses.text: Again, a new commandment I write to you, which thing is true in Him and in you, because the darkness is passing away, and the true light is already shining.
parts: Again, a new commandment I write to you, which thing is true in Him and in you, because the darkness is passing away, and the true light is already shining.

verses.text: He who says he is in the light, and hates his brother, is in darkness until now.He who loves his brother abides in the light, and there is no cause for stumbling in him.But he who hates his brother is in darkness and walks in darkness, and does not know where he is going, because the darkness has blinded his eyes.
parts: He who says he is in the light, and hates his brother, is in darkness until now.He who loves his brother abides in the light, and there is no cause for stumbling in him.But he who hates his brother is in darkness and walks in darkness, and does not know where he is going, because the darkness has blinded his eyes.

verses.text: He who loves his brother abides in the light, and there is no cause for stumbling in him.
parts: He who loves his brother abides in the light, and there is no cause for stumbling in him.

verses.text: But he who hates his brother is in darkness and walks in darkness, and does not know where he is going, because the darkness has blinded his eyes.
parts: But he who hates his brother is in darkness and walks in darkness, and does not know where he is going, because the darkness has blinded his eyes.

verses.text: Do not love the world or the things in the world. If anyone loves the world, the love of the Father is not in him.For all thatisin the world—the lust of the flesh, the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life—is not of the Father but is of the world.And the world is passing away, and the lust of it; but he who does the will of God abides forever.
parts: Do not love the world or the things in the world. If anyone loves the world, the love of the Father is not in him.
For all that
in the world—the lust of the flesh, the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life—is not of the Father but is of the world.
And the world is passing away, and the lust of it; but he who does the will of God abides forever.

verses.text: For all thatisin the world—the lust of the flesh, the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life—is not of the Father but is of the world.
parts: For all that
in the world—the lust of the flesh, the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life—is not of the Father but is of the world.

verses.text: And the world is passing away, and the lust of it; but he who does the will of God abides forever.
parts: And the world is passing away, and the lust of it; but he who does the will of God abides forever.

verses.text: Little children, it is the last hour; and as you have heard that theaAntichrist is coming, even now many antichrists have come, by which we know that it is the last hour.They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would have continued with us; butthey went outthat they might be made manifest, that none of them were of us.
parts: Little children, it is the last hour; and as you have heard that the
Antichrist is coming, even now many antichrists have come, by which we know that it is the last hour.
They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would have continued with us; but
that they might be made manifest, that none of them were of us.

verses.text: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would have continued with us; butthey went outthat they might be made manifest, that none of them were of us.
parts: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would have continued with us; but
that they might be made manifest, that none of them were of us.

verses.text: But you have an anointing from the Holy One, and you know all things.aI have not written to you because you do not know the truth, but because you know it, and that no lie is of the truth.
parts: But you have an anointing from the Holy One, and you know all things.
I have not written to you because you do not know the truth, but because you know it, and that no lie is of the truth.

verses.text: I have not written to you because you do not know the truth, but because you know it, and that no lie is of the truth.
parts: I have not written to you because you do not know the truth, but because you know it, and that no lie is of the truth.

verses.text: Who is a liar but he who denies that Jesus is the Christ? He is antichrist who denies the Father and the Son.Whoever denies the Son does not have the Father either; he who acknowledges the Son has the Father also.
parts: Who is a liar but he who denies that Jesus is the Christ? He is antichrist who denies the Father and the Son.
Whoever denies the Son does not have the Father either; he who acknowledges the Son has the Father also.

verses.text: Whoever denies the Son does not have the Father either; he who acknowledges the Son has the Father also.
parts: Whoever denies the Son does not have the Father either; he who acknowledges the Son has the Father also.

verses.text: Therefore let that abide in you which you heard from the beginning. If what you heard from the beginning abides in you, you also will abide in the Son and in the Father.And this is the promise that He has promised us—eternal life.
parts: Therefore let that abide in you which you heard from the beginning. If what you heard from the beginning abides in you, you also will abide in the Son and in the Father.
And this is the promise that He has promised us—eternal life.

verses.text: And this is the promise that He has promised us—eternal life.
parts: And this is the promise that He has promised us—eternal life.

verses.text: These things I have written to you concerning those whotry todeceive you.But the anointing which you have received from Him abides in you, and you do not need that anyone teach you; but as the same anointing teaches you concerning all things, and is true, and is not a lie, and just as it has taught you, you willaabide in Him.
parts: These things I have written to you concerning those who

deceive you.But the anointing which you have received from Him abides in you, and you do not need that anyone teach you; but as the same anointing teaches you concerning all things, and is true, and is not a lie, and just as it has taught you, you will
abide in Him.

verses.text: But the anointing which you have received from Him abides in you, and you do not need that anyone teach you; but as the same anointing teaches you concerning all things, and is true, and is not a lie, and just as it has taught you, you willaabide in Him.
parts: But the anointing which you have received from Him abides in you, and you do not need that anyone teach you; but as the same anointing teaches you concerning all things, and is true, and is not a lie, and just as it has taught you, you will
abide in Him.

verses.text: And now, little children, abide in Him, that whenaHe appears, we may have confidence and not be ashamed before Him at His coming.If you know that He is righteous, you know that everyone who practices righteousness is born of Him.
parts: And now, little children, abide in Him, that when
He appears, we may have confidence and not be ashamed before Him at His coming.If you know that He is righteous, you know that everyone who practices righteousness is born of Him.

verses.text: If you know that He is righteous, you know that everyone who practices righteousness is born of Him.
parts: If you know that He is righteous, you know that everyone who practices righteousness is born of Him.

verses.text: Beloved, now we are children of God; and it has not yet been revealed what we shall be, but we know that when He is revealed, we shall be like Him, for we shall see Him as He is.
parts: Beloved, now we are children of God; and it has not yet been revealed what we shall be, but we know that when He is revealed, we shall be like Him, for we shall see Him as He is.

verses.text: And everyone who has this hope in Him purifies himself, just as He is pure.
parts: And everyone who has this hope in Him purifies himself, just as He is pure.

verses.text: Whoever commits sin also commits lawlessness, and sin is lawlessness.And you know that He was manifested to take away our sins, and in Him there is no sin.Whoever abides in Him does not sin. Whoever sins has neither seen Him nor known Him.
parts: Whoever commits sin also commits lawlessness, and sin is lawlessness.
And you know that He was manifested to take away our sins, and in Him there is no sin.Whoever abides in Him does not sin. Whoever sins has neither seen Him nor known Him.

verses.text: And you know that He was manifested to take away our sins, and in Him there is no sin.
parts: And you know that He was manifested to take away our sins, and in Him there is no sin.

verses.text: Whoever abides in Him does not sin.
parts: Whoever abides in Him does not sin.

verses.text: Little children, let no one deceive you. He who practices righteousness is righteous, just as He is righteous.He who sins is of the devil, for the devil has sinned from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that He might destroy the works of the devil.Whoever has been born of God does not sin, for His seed remains in him; and he cannot sin, because he has been born of God.
parts: Little children, let no one deceive you. He who practices righteousness is righteous, just as He is righteous.He who sins is of the devil, for the devil has sinned from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that He might destroy the works of the devil.Whoever has been born of God does not sin, for His seed remains in him; and he cannot sin, because he has been born of God.

verses.text: He who sins is of the devil, for the devil has sinned from the beginning.
parts: He who sins is of the devil, for the devil has sinned from the beginning.

verses.text: Whoever has been born of God does not sin, for His seed remains in him; and he cannot sin, because he has been born of God.
parts: Whoever has been born of God does not sin, for His seed remains in him; and he cannot sin, because he has been born of God.

verses.text: In this the children of God and the children of the devil are manifest: Whoever does not practice righteousness is not of God, norishe who does not love his brother.For this is the message that you heard from the beginning, that we should love one another, not as Cainwhowas of the wicked one and murdered his brother. And why did he murder him? Because his works were evil and his brother's righteous.
parts: In this the children of God and the children of the devil are manifest: Whoever does not practice righteousness is not of God, nor
he who does not love his brother.For this is the message that you heard from the beginning, that we should love one another, not as Cain
was of the wicked one and murdered his brother. And why did he murder him? Because his works were evil and his brother's righteous.

verses.text: For this is the message that you heard from the beginning, that we should love one another,
parts: For this is the message that you heard from the beginning, that we should love one another,

verses.text: not as Cainwhowas of the wicked one and murdered his brother.
parts: not as Cain
was of the wicked one and murdered his brother.

verses.text: Do not marvel, my brethren, if the world hates you.We know that we have passed from death to life, because we love the brethren. He who does not lovehisbrotheraabides in death.Whoever hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life abiding in him.
parts: Do not marvel, my brethren, if the world hates you.We know that we have passed from death to life, because we love the brethren. He who does not love
brother
abides in death.Whoever hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life abiding in him.

verses.text: We know that we have passed from death to life, because we love the brethren.
parts: We know that we have passed from death to life, because we love the brethren.

verses.text: Whoever hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life abiding in him.
parts: Whoever hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life abiding in him.

verses.text: By this we know love, because He laid down His life for us. And we also ought to lay downourlives for the brethren.But whoever has this world's goods, and sees his brother in need, and shuts up his heart from him, how does the love of God abide in him?
parts: By this we know love, because He laid down His life for us. And we also ought to lay down
lives for the brethren.But whoever has this world's goods, and sees his brother in need, and shuts up his heart from him, how does the love of God abide in him?

verses.text: But whoever has this world's goods, and sees his brother in need, and shuts up his heart from him, how does the love of God abide in him?
parts: But whoever has this world's goods, and sees his brother in need, and shuts up his heart from him, how does the love of God abide in him?

verses.text: My little children, let us not love in word or in tongue, but in deed and in truth.And by this we knowathat we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before Him.For if our heart condemns us, God is greater than our heart, and knows all things.Beloved, if our heart does not condemn us, we have confidence toward God.And whatever we ask we receive from Him, because we keep His commandments and do those things that are pleasing in His sight.And this is His commandment: that we should believe on the name of His Son Jesus Christ and love one another, as He gave usacommandment.
parts: My little children, let us not love in word or in tongue, but in deed and in truth.And by this we know

that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before Him.For if our heart condemns us, God is greater than our heart, and knows all things.Beloved, if our heart does not condemn us, we have confidence toward God.And whatever we ask we receive from Him, because we keep His commandments and do those things that are pleasing in His sight.And this is His commandment: that we should believe on the name of His Son Jesus Christ and love one another, as He gave us
commandment.

verses.text: And by this we knowathat we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before Him.
parts: And by this we know
that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before Him.

verses.text: For if our heart condemns us, God is greater than our heart, and knows all things.
parts: For if our heart condemns us, God is greater than our heart, and knows all things.

verses.text: Beloved, if our heart does not condemn us, we have confidence toward God.
parts: Beloved, if our heart does not condemn us, we have confidence toward God.

verses.text: And whatever we ask we receive from Him, because we keep His commandments and do those things that are pleasing in His sight.
parts: And whatever we ask we receive from Him, because we keep His commandments and do those things that are pleasing in His sight.

verses.text: And this is His commandment: that we should believe on the name of His Son Jesus Christ and love one another, as He gave usacommandment.
parts: And this is His commandment: that we should believe on the name of His Son Jesus Christ and love one another, as He gave us
commandment.

verses.text: Now he who keeps His commandments abides in Him, and He in him. And by this we know that He abides in us, by the Spirit whom He has given us.
parts: Now he who keeps His commandments abides in Him, and He in him. And by this we know that He abides in us, by the Spirit whom He has given us.

verses.text: By this you know the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesses that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is of God,
parts: By this you know the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesses that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is of God,

verses.text: and every spirit that does not confess thataJesus Christ has come in the flesh is not of God.
parts: and every spirit that does not confess that
Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is not of God.

verses.text: You are of God, little children, and have overcome them, because He who is in you is greater than he who is in the world.They are of the world. Therefore they speakasof the world, and the world hears them.We are of God. He who knows God hears us; he who is not of God does not hear us. By this we know the spirit of truth and the spirit of error.
parts: You are of God, little children, and have overcome them, because He who is in you is greater than he who is in the world.They are of the world. Therefore they speak
of the world, and the world hears them.We are of God. He who knows God hears us; he who is not of God does not hear us. By this we know the spirit of truth and the spirit of error.

verses.text: They are of the world.
parts: They are of the world.

verses.text: We are of God.
parts: We are of God.

verses.text: Beloved, let us love one another, for love is of God; and everyone who loves is born of God and knows God.He who does not love does not know God, for God is love.In this the love of God was manifested toward us, that God has sent His only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through Him.In this is love, not that we loved God, but that He loved us and sent His Sonto bethe propitiation for our sins.Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.
parts: Beloved, let us love one another, for love is of God; and everyone who loves is born of God and knows God.

He who does not love does not know God, for God is love.In this the love of God was manifested toward us, that God has sent His only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through Him.In this is love, not that we loved God, but that He loved us and sent His Son
the propitiation for our sins.
Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.

verses.text: He who does not love does not know God, for God is love.
parts: He who does not love does not know God, for God is love.

verses.text: In this the love of God was manifested toward us, that God has sent His only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through Him.
parts: In this the love of God was manifested toward us, that God has sent His only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through Him.

verses.text: In this is love, not that we loved God, but that He loved us and sent His Sonto bethe propitiation for our sins.
parts: In this is love, not that we loved God, but that He loved us and sent His Son
the propitiation for our sins.

verses.text: Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.
parts: Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.

verses.text: No one has seen God at any time. If we love one another, God abides in us, and His love has been perfected in us.By this we know that we abide in Him, and He in us, because He has given us of His Spirit.And we have seen and testify that the Father has sent the SonasSavior of the world.Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God, God abides in him, and he in God.And we have known and believed the love that God has for us. God is love, and he who abides in love abides in God, and God in him.
parts: No one has seen God at any time. If we love one another, God abides in us, and His love has been perfected in us.
By this we know that we abide in Him, and He in us, because He has given us of His Spirit.And we have seen and testify that the Father has sent the Son

Savior of the world.Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God, God abides in him, and he in God.And we have known and believed the love that God has for us. God is love, and he who abides in love abides in God, and God in him.

verses.text: By this we know that we abide in Him, and He in us, because He has given us of His Spirit.
parts: By this we know that we abide in Him, and He in us, because He has given us of His Spirit.

verses.text: And we have seen and testify that the Father has sent the SonasSavior of the world.
parts: And we have seen and testify that the Father has sent the Son
Savior of the world.

verses.text: Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God, God abides in him, and he in God.
parts: Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God, God abides in him, and he in God.

verses.text: And we have known and believed the love that God has for us.
parts: And we have known and believed the love that God has for us.

verses.text: Love has been perfected among us in this: that we may have boldness in the day of judgment; because as He is, so are we in this world.There is no fear in love; but perfect love casts out fear, because fear involves torment. But he who fears has not been made perfect in love.We love Himabecause He first loved us.
parts: Love has been perfected among us in this: that we may have boldness in the day of judgment; because as He is, so are we in this world.There is no fear in love; but perfect love casts out fear, because fear involves torment. But he who fears has not been made perfect in love.We love Him
because He first loved us.

verses.text: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casts out fear, because fear involves torment.
parts: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casts out fear, because fear involves torment.

verses.text: We love Himabecause He first loved us.
parts: We love Him
because He first loved us.

verses.text: If someone says, “I love God,” and hates his brother, he is a liar; for he who does not love his brother whom he has seen, how canahe love God whom he has not seen?And this commandment we have from Him: that he who loves Godmustlove his brother also.
parts: If someone says, “I love God,” and hates his brother, he is a liar; for he who does not love his brother whom he has seen, how can
he love God whom he has not seen?And this commandment we have from Him: that he who loves God
love his brother also.

verses.text: And this commandment we have from Him: that he who loves Godmustlove his brother also.
parts: And this commandment we have from Him: that he who loves God
love his brother also.

verses.text: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God and keep His commandments.
parts: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God and keep His commandments.

verses.text: For this is the love of God, that we keep His commandments.
parts: For this is the love of God, that we keep His commandments.

verses.text: For whatever is born of God overcomes the world.
parts: For whatever is born of God overcomes the world.

verses.text: Who is he who overcomes the world, but he who believes that Jesus is the Son of God?
parts: Who is he who overcomes the world, but he who believes that Jesus is the Son of God?

verses.text: This is He who came by water and blood—Jesus Christ; not only by water, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit who bears witness, because the Spirit is truth.For there are three that bear witness in heaven: the Father, the Word, and the Holy Spirit; and these three are one.And there are three that bear witness on earth:athe Spirit, the water, and the blood; and these three agree as one.
parts: This is He who came by water and blood—Jesus Christ; not only by water, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit who bears witness, because the Spirit is truth.
For there are three that bear witness in heaven: the Father, the Word, and the Holy Spirit; and these three are one.And there are three that bear witness on earth:
the Spirit, the water, and the blood; and these three agree as one.

verses.text: For there are three that bear witness in heaven: the Father, the Word, and the Holy Spirit; and these three are one.
parts: For there are three that bear witness in heaven: the Father, the Word, and the Holy Spirit; and these three are one.

verses.text: And there are three that bear witness on earth:athe Spirit, the water, and the blood; and these three agree as one.
parts: And there are three that bear witness on earth:
the Spirit, the water, and the blood; and these three agree as one.

verses.text: If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater; for this is the witness of God whichaHe has testified of His Son.He who believes in the Son of God has the witness in himself; he who does not believe God has made Him a liar, because he has not believed the testimony that God has given of His Son.And this is the testimony: that God has given us eternal life, and this life is in His Son.He who has the Son has life; he who does not have the Son of God does not have life.These things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, that you may know that you have eternal life,aand that you maycontinue tobelieve in the name of the Son of God.
parts: If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater; for this is the witness of God which

He has testified of His Son.He who believes in the Son of God has the witness in himself; he who does not believe God has made Him a liar, because he has not believed the testimony that God has given of His Son.And this is the testimony: that God has given us eternal life, and this life is in His Son.He who has the Son has life; he who does not have the Son of God does not have life.These things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, that you may know that you have eternal life,
and that you may
believe in the name of the Son of God.

verses.text: He who believes in the Son of God has the witness in himself; he who does not believe God has made Him a liar, because he has not believed the testimony that God has given of His Son.
parts: He who believes in the Son of God has the witness in himself; he who does not believe God has made Him a liar, because he has not believed the testimony that God has given of His Son.

verses.text: And this is the testimony: that God has given us eternal life, and this life is in His Son.
parts: And this is the testimony: that God has given us eternal life, and this life is in His Son.

verses.text: He who has the Son has life; he who does not have the Son of God does not have life.
parts: He who has the Son has life; he who does not have the Son of God does not have life.

verses.text: These things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, that you may know that you have eternal life,aand that you maycontinue tobelieve in the name of the Son of God.
parts: These things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, that you may know that you have eternal life,
and that you may
believe in the name of the Son of God.

verses.text: Now this is the confidence that we have in Him, that if we ask anything according to His will, He hears us.And if we know that He hears us, whatever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we have asked of Him.
parts: Now this is the confidence that we have in Him, that if we ask anything according to His will, He hears us.And if we know that He hears us, whatever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we have asked of Him.

verses.text: And if we know that He hears us, whatever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we have asked of Him.
parts: And if we know that He hears us, whatever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we have asked of Him.

verses.text: If anyone sees his brother sinning a sinwhich doesnotleadto death, he will ask, and He will give him life for those who commit sin notleadingto death. There is sinleadingto death. I do not say that he should pray about that.All unrighteousness is sin, and there is sin notleadingto death.
parts: If anyone sees his brother sinning a sin
not
to death, he will ask, and He will give him life for those who commit sin not
to death. There is sin
to death. I do not say that he should pray about that.
All unrighteousness is sin, and there is sin not
to death.

verses.text: All unrighteousness is sin, and there is sin notleadingto death.
parts: All unrighteousness is sin, and there is sin not
to death.

verses.text: We know that whoever is born of God does not sin; but he who has been born of God keeps himself,aand the wicked one does not touch him.
parts: We know that whoever is born of God does not sin; but he who has been born of God keeps himself,
and the wicked one does not touch him.

verses.text: We know that we are of God, and the whole world liesunder the sway ofthe wicked one.
parts: We know that we are of God, and the whole world lies
the wicked one.

verses.text: And we know that the Son of God has come and has given us an understanding, that we may know Him who is true; and we are in Him who is true, in His Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God and eternal life.
parts: And we know that the Son of God has come and has given us an understanding, that we may know Him who is true; and we are in Him who is true, in His Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God and eternal life.

verses.text: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.
parts: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.
